name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gradient Merge for Google Calendar™ Events
name.es: Gradiente Merge para Google Calendar™ Datos

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take your duplicate Google Calendar events and merge them into one event.
short.es: Extensión de Chrome que se funde visualmente el mismo evento en múltiples calendarios de Google en un solo evento.
short.fr: Une extension Chrome qui fusionne visuellement les évènements identiques de plusieurs calendriers Google en un seul.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension also uses the user defined colors of each calendar to create a beautiful gradient for each event. 

After installed, click on the plugin to activate then refresh Google Calendar to see your new cleaned up Google Calendar.

Modified from: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/event-merge-for-google-ca/idehaflielbgpaokehlhidbjlehlfcep

Repo at: https://github.com/karjna/gradient-gcal-event-merge
long.es,fr:
This Chrome extension will take your duplicate Google Calendar events and merge them into one event. It also uses the user defined colors of each calendar to create a beautiful gradient color for each event. 

After installed, click on the plugin to activate then refresh Google Calendar to see your new cleaned up Google Calendar.
